name: Swarfarm DarkSkin
description:
This is my DarkSkin for Swarfarm.com the skin is still in beta.
Most likely this skin isn't even close to perfect "written" since I'm a noob :), but I tried my best!
Feel free to suggest improvements!

Inspired by: Nocturnal Whatsapp!
additional_info:

-Added Footer Color
